title: 'Nice snug good quality belts'
body: These belts are exactly as shown in the product photos. Go ahead and buy them. They are value for money, and excellent quality. I just wish they were longer, as I had purchased these belts for an old relative who has a bigger waist size. But unfortunately the belts didn't fit fully, though belts quality was good so I kept them instead. Seller should procure and sell longer belts for people with better waists.

title: 'Second belt in combo is of poor quality'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. I ordered two belts as a combo from Zara. The brown belt is shorter by 2 inches and has a damaged buckle. I was expecting better product quality since I was a return customer. The second black belt is good quality. If i have to return the belt and ask for a new one both belts have to be returned. The other belt is out of stock.'
